subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Hockey, Ice
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Nascar driver Danica Patrick won the pole position at the Daytona 500 on Sunday. In the N.B.A. All-Star game, Chris Paul offered heroics of his own.
snippet: The Nascar driver Danica Patrick won the pole position at the Daytona 500 on Sunday. In the N.B.A. All-Star game, Chris Paul offered heroics of his own.
